usefulItems: fine-mesh sieve, glasses, large bowl, plastic wrap, large jug, nut milk bag or 2 muslin cloths, refrigerator
title: Horchata

preparations.content: Place a large bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh almonds and 500 g of the water into it. Set aside.

Place rice and cinnamon quill into mixing bowl and mill <b>25 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer into bowl with almonds and cover with plastic wrap. Place into refrigerator for 10-12 hours. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place sugar, remaining 500 g water and reserved soaked almonds into mixing bowl and blend <b>1 min/speed 6<b>, until completely smooth.

Line a fine-mesh sieve with two layers of muslin cloth or a nut milk bag and place over a jug.  Transfer mixture into lined sieve and squeeze any remaining pulp to extract as much liquid as possible. Discard leftover pulp.
Divide horchata between 4 glasses and add ice. Dust with ground cinnamon before serving immediately.

hintsAndTricks: You can substitute almonds with whole or slivered almonds which have already been blanched.
If not serving immediately, place into refrigerator. Slight separation may occur, so stir prior to serving.
